# Results

## Election Vote Results Visualizations

### State-level

```{r}
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(statebins)

president2020 <- readr::read_csv(here("./data/clean/president2020.csv"))

# Note: direction = 1 switches the order of the fill scale 
# so darker shades represent higher illiteracy rates
# (The default is -1).

statebins(president2020, value_col="dem_percent",
          name = "Votes for Biden", direction = 1)+
  theme_statebins()+
  labs(title = "2020 US Election Results: Joe Biden  Vote%",caption = "Source: cookpolitical : Nov 21", fill = NULL)+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
        plot.caption = element_text(color = "grey68"),
        legend.position="bottom",
        axis.text.y = element_blank())
```
